title: How to Make Root Beer Pie

steps.headline: Pour the heavy cream into a bowl.
Mix the pudding mix, milk, and root beer in another bowl until thick.
Fold one mix into the other mix.
Pour the new mix into the graham cracker crust.
Freeze or set.
steps.description: Freeze the mixture for four hours in the freezer or setting in the fridge overnight.

text: Pour the heavy cream into a bowl. Beat until stiff peaks form. Mix the pudding mix, milk, and root beer in another bowl until thick.  Fold one mix into the other mix.  Pour the new mix into the graham cracker crust.  Freeze or set. Freeze the mixture for four hours in the freezer or setting in the fridge overnight.
